95.eng-name: Accepting Information Given by a Truthful Person

hadiths.text: Narrated `Umar:I came and behold, Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) was staying on a Mashroba (attic room) and a black slave of Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) was at the top if its stairs. I said to him, "(Tell the Prophet) that here is `Umar bin Al- Khattab (asking for permission to enter)." Then he admitted me

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى: {لاَ تَدْخُلُوا بُيُوتَ النَّبِيِّ إِلاَّ أَنْ يُؤْذَنَ لَكُمْ}
chapter.eng-name: Enter not the Prophet (ﷺ) ’s (ﷺ) houses unless permission is given to you…”
